original_title: 新人NO.1STYLE ‘巷で噂のパーフェクトボディ’現役外資系OL 相澤ゆりなAVデビュー
overview: The AV debut work of an active clerk who works for a foreign-affiliated company that became a hot topic in a certain weekly magazine. She hated her always standing out in her life so far, and she decided to appear on AV as "I want to meet a new self in a new world ...". Super S-class OL with stunning proportions when you take off her clothes! This would be called a perfect body. Watch her documentary first sex as she becomes embarrassed but aggressive.
title: Fresh Face NO. 1 STYLE the Rumored Perfect Body - Active Office Lady at a Foreign Company Yurina Aizawa's AV Debut
